Skane06918t73snp8pe6c3jbcmzop3tz1fqu6nnvc1332442014-05-06T20:32:15ZThe Snow Prince24099677[[Image:Skane.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Skane off the coast of Westeros.]]

'''Skane''' is an island in [[the North]]. It is located off the north-eastern coast of [[Westeros]], in the [[Bay of Seals]]. It is located to the north of its larger sister island, [[Skagos]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/castle-black/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Castle Black entry]</ref><ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/karhold/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Karhold entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Skane is noted as being uninhabited. Skane was raided long ago by the Skagosi, with its inhabitants supposedly killed and eaten.
